website_summaries.verdict: If authenticity is your top priority in choosing a piñata, this one is made in Mexico by artists that are experienced in the craft. It also stands out when it comes to quality and looks.
pros: We love that it can fit more candy and toys than you might expect
Has a cute llama design with bold, eye-catching colors
cons: Slightly more difficult to fill than others on our shortlist, but this isn't a deal-breaker

customer_reviews.title: Terrific llama pinata for son's Fortnite party
customer_reviews.text: This fortnite llama worked out great. We stuffed it to the gills with candy, stickers and stuff. Took about 10 decent whacks from 10-year-old boys before it fell apart. Kids loved it.
customer_reviews.author: MCR

customer_reviews.title: Not Bad Overall
customer_reviews.text: It looks great and is the perfect size for a small party or small children. I loved the quality and structure of the product. However the fact that there's no opening to fill it is very unusual. I had to make my own opening in order to fill it (holds a little under 2.5 pounds of candy/ mixed party favors).
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Not great quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: you can see the newspaper in multiple areas, there are tears in the stickers on the outside and it’s much smaller than the average piniata. Also there’s not a flap to put the candy in, you actually have to puncture a hole in the top to fill it. It does look like the fortnight llama, that’s about all it has going for it.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Knott

customer_reviews.title: Too small for the price tag
customer_reviews.text: The product was attractive and study. It was quite small for $30. I looked at the dimensions and thought it would work but in person it’s just too small. My husband just laughed and said no..send it back. So I am. I’d pay $15-20 max
customer_reviews.author: Randiessa Isenhower

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you check the dimensions carefully this is pretty small
customer_reviews.text: Make sure you read carefully the dimensions on this one. This was much smaller than we intended. Item itself is very well built and will hold up to many whacks!
customer_reviews.author: Nelson Mandela

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: It's absolutely adorable, we bought it for my son's 8th birthday. He loves it, I just wish it was a bit bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looked great
customer_reviews.text: My son LOVED his pinata!! He looked great! I only wish it lasted more than one round with the kids!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Williams

customer_reviews.title: Small
customer_reviews.text: Thought it would be bigger than what it was. Would have ordered a more expensive one if I would have known it was so small. Might have to get a second pinata :/
customer_reviews.author: Ashlie

customer_reviews.title: Lots of Fun!
customer_reviews.text: Product looks great- my son at first wanted to keep it in his room instead using it for party haha.. Kids love it!
customer_reviews.author: Agata L.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fortnite Llama piñata
customer_reviews.text: The best Fortnite Llama piñata ever!!! The kids loved it and boy it took a whacking!
customer_reviews.author: CaraG NH

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality.
customer_reviews.text: Hi, I lurchased this for my daughter's birthday, and the quality is amazing. Easy to set up, and the best part is how the Llama looks just like the real deal. Best pinata around.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Sterio

customer_reviews.title: Back feet broken
customer_reviews.text: The piñata looks great, size is good, but the two back feet were broken. I had to tape them on because there wouldn't have been enough time to return it and receive a new one before son's bday
customer_reviews.author: Bliss777

customer_reviews.title: Awesome.
customer_reviews.text: Very cute and my son and his friends loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Hay

customer_reviews.title: Great for parties can hold a lot of candy
customer_reviews.text: Held up really well, all of the kids got a lot of turns
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Marsh

customer_reviews.title: So dissatisfied
customer_reviews.text: The top where i should’ve been able to hang piñata was broken there was no plug after filling the piñata and then he legs and eyes were falling off very dissatisfied
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Very cute.
customer_reviews.text: A little smaller than I expected which is my only reason for not giving it 5 stars. Otherwise it looks exactly like the picture, very cute, and easy to break for the children.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Marie

customer_reviews.title: Good for Fortnite kids
customer_reviews.text: Basically paying for the fortnite aspect but that’s what some kid’s want!
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: nicely made
customer_reviews.text: good small size. Definitely not large enough for a party of 10+ kids. Only used for decor in my son's birthday party.
customer_reviews.author: Bri

customer_reviews.title: Most importantly it’s pretty durable
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend this piñata my son got this for his bday and absolutely loved it.
customer_reviews.author: tiffany grogan

customer_reviews.title: Not to big not to small
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality and held a good a mount of candy
customer_reviews.author: MELISSA TERAN

customer_reviews.title: Loved It!
customer_reviews.text: Great piñata! Looks just like the picture. Holds a lot of candy as well.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper than expected.
customer_reviews.text: Cheaper made than expected for the price. But worth it bc of the look on my son's face.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Fortnite piñata
customer_reviews.text: It is cute but extremely tiny. It would be more for a younger child, perhaps two years old. I got it for my sons 10th birthday. I don't know how much normal pinatas are but for the price I expected a little larger.
customer_reviews.author: eric estrada

customer_reviews.title: Made in Mexico!
customer_reviews.text: Love that this is authentic made in Mexico! My son loved this so that he didn’t want to put candy in it and bust it up- he wanted to save it.
customer_reviews.author: Ann M

customer_reviews.title: Loved it A big hit at our party tons of compliments!
customer_reviews.text: My son absolutely loved this piñata! It’s very well made and beautiful pictures don’t do it justice!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Best Llama Pinata
customer_reviews.text: Grandson was very happy with the llama pinata. Held tons of candy. His party was a success!!
customer_reviews.author: Lovey

customer_reviews.title: Only good for kids!
customer_reviews.text: It looked nothing like the picture and was smaller than expected! Probably for smaller kids and not a battle royale.
customer_reviews.author: Ninod212

customer_reviews.title: Great pinata!
customer_reviews.text: Great pinata! Had a lot of fun with it for a birthday!!
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Heischman

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Great pinta...looks just like the real fortnite llama...the kids had a blast with it
customer_reviews.author: cynthia carpenter

customer_reviews.title: "I am a bot"
customer_reviews.text: Great pinata! It only lasted thru a few whacks before it dropped all the candy. BIG WHACKS! from BIG KIDS! After they finished grabbing all the candy the beat the crap out of it until it was unrecognizable except for the colors. I think they had more fun destroying it than they did gathering treats. Held ALOTTA candy, small toys. I made the hole a little larger. It hung well too. Without feeling like it was going to fall apart.
customer_reviews.author: Mz Po*Z

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, neck is a little weak
customer_reviews.text: The pinata look great, the cosmetics we're high quality. It is smaller than I expected even though I knew it was going to be small but it does hold quite a bit of candy. I initially thought pretty sturdy but the neck seems to be the weak point. I attached a photo of how it died. RIP
customer_reviews.author: Fernando C

customer_reviews.title: Loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for son’s bday. Everyone loved it. Got in a dozen or so good blows before it gave way, so I think it worked great. Buy plenty of candy to put in it.
customer_reviews.author: Kellyn

customer_reviews.title: Nice but small for the price
customer_reviews.text: Is a nice and cute but the pinata is small. My son liked it but I just felt that for the price it could of been bigger. But it got the job done
customer_reviews.author: Lela

customer_reviews.title: My son loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 7 year old son’s birthday party. Made it through 8 kids!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Jeffers

customer_reviews.title: Great, totally recognizable Fortnite llama pinata!
customer_reviews.text: My 11-year-old son loves it! Good size and really looks like the Fortnite llama.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. S

customer_reviews.title: Great Piñata
customer_reviews.text: It was definitely a “hit” at my son’s 12th birthday party.
customer_reviews.author: John S.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect llama pinata!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect pinata for son's birthday party. All the kids loved it!
customer_reviews.author: June

customer_reviews.title: worked great for 9 yo party
customer_reviews.text: kids had fun, it lasted a few good hits then spit out the candy!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Won’t be buying again
customer_reviews.text: This arrived today broken..not good quality. My son’s birthday is just in a few short days.
customer_reviews.author: Terezmarie

product_meta.title: Lytio Llama Loot Battle Royale Pinata Party Favors Ideal for Birthday Parties, Decor and Photo Boot Accessory H:21" L:15.5" W:4.5"
feature_bullets: This llama is perfect for any birthday party that needs extra loot.
Holds a good amount of 2LB of goodies and candy.
It's perfect for parties, birthday gifts, anniversaries & more! This will be a definite hit at the party.
These are sturdy pinatas and will withstand many hits!
Celebrate your next party with this exclusive Llama must-have and everyone will be jealous that they couldn't find this rare llama first.
